name: nanoshooter
description: Robotic tank combat 3D multiplayer action web game.

scripts.postinstall: echo Initializing Nanoshooter. && typings install && git submodule init && git submodule update && cd node_modules/susa && npm install --silent && npm run initialize --silent && echo Project ready!
scripts.build-nanoshooter: echo Building Nanoshooter. && npm run clean --silent && tsc && tslint src/**/*.ts
scripts.build: npm run build-susa && npm run build-nanoshooter && echo Project build complete!
scripts.test: echo No tests yet, lol && exit 0

author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>
